quotes.quote: She's very free-spirited and fun, not a care in the world. Like me in my freshman year. I could definitely see it. Just the natural ability.
The moment you can visualize being free from the things that hold you back you have indeed begun to set yourself free.
Sometimes you have to kind of die inside in order to rise from your own ashes and believe in yourself and love yourself to become a new person.
I have been and still am a seeker, but I have ceased to question stars and books; I have begun to listen to the teaching my blood whispers to me.
It takes courage...to endure the sharp pains of self discovery rather than choose to take the dull pain of unconsciousness that would last the rest of our lives.
People often say that this or that person has not yet found himself. But the self is not something one finds, it is something one creates.
If you don't get lost, there's a chance you may never be found.

I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately, to front only the essential facts of life, and see if I could not learn what it had to teach, and not, when I came to die, discover that I had not lived.
Life is either a daring adventure or nothing. To keep our faces toward change and behave likefree spirits in the presence of fate is strength undefeatable.
Restore unto me the joy of thy salvation; and uphold me with thy free spirit.
They can't chain my spirit! My spirit runs free! Walls can't contain it! Laws can't restrain it! Authority has no power over it!
Don't gain the world and lose your soul; wisdom is better than silver or gold.
Tourists don't know where they've been, travelers don't know where they're going.
Never lose yourself while trying to hold on to someone who doesn't care about losing you.
The more time you waste trying to be what others want you to be, the more you lose yourself.
You were born an original. Don't die a copy
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
And remember, no matter where you go, there you are.
Man stands in his own shadow and wonders why it's dark.
To thine own self be true.
Don't give so much of yourself to others that you end up losing yourself.
The more you lose yourself in something bigger than yourself, the more energy you will have.
I have always considered myself a free spirit with a Gypsy soul. Surrendering to where ever life takes me.
once you lose yourself, you have two choices: find the person you used to be, or lose that person completely.
I'm so young, and I'm single, and I just want to drift.
When you lose touch with yourself, you lose yourself in the world.
You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.

Love yourself accept yourself be yourselfthese qualities will create for the first time an individual whose inner flame is undividable a great pool of energy will gather and surround youwith this an inner trust will arise from within you.
A free spirit must be able to surmount anxiety time after time.
A free spirit takes liberties even with liberty itself.
